containerName.description: Name of the container to associate with the load balancer (as it appears in a container definition).

containerPort.description:
Port on the container to associate with the load balancer.

> **Version note:** Multiple `load_balancer` configuration block support was added in version 2.22.0 of the provider. This allows configuration of [ECS service support for multiple target groups](https://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2019/07/amazon-ecs-services-now-support-multiple-load-balancer-target-groups/).

elbName.description: Name of the ELB (Classic) to associate with the service.

targetGroupArn.description: ARN of the Load Balancer target group to associate with the service.
